name: Edict Stormblaster
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor arc to weapons and engines, dealing %s of the energy damage and %s of the EMP damage dealt by the original hit.

name: Lethargy Autolance
tags: pd9, beam6, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_dealer, codex_unlockable
customPrimary: Hits damp the target's velocity, instantly reducing current speed. %s of damage dealt builds %s against shields, the remainder is dealt as soft flux. Damping effect is reduced to half on shield hits.
customAncillary: Fires beams with no travel time.

name: Lethargy Autolance (Fighter)
customPrimary: Hits damp the target's velocity, instantly reducing current speed. %s of damage dealt builds %s against shields, the remainder is dealt as soft flux. Damping effect is reduced to half on shield hits.
customAncillary: Fires beams with no travel time.

name: Reckoner Autolance Array
tags: pd15, beam10, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_dealer, codex_unlockable
customPrimary: Hits damp the target's velocity, instantly reducing current speed. %s of damage dealt builds %s against shields, the remainder is dealt as soft flux. Damping effect is reduced to half on shield hits.
customAncillary: Fires beams from five emitters simultaneously with no travel time. Central emitter fires forwards and deals %s of the total damage. Secondary beams fire across a %s arc, auto-targeting the nearest ship, fighter or missile to the emitter's facing.

name: Mercy Multilance
tags: energy20, beam15, LR, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_dealer, codex_unlockable
customPrimary: Beams treat all shields as having %s shield efficiency. On firing, also looses a blast of 12 projectiles that deals a total of %s points of %s damage and %s points of %s damage. When hitting hull or armor, convert any resisted %s damage to %s damage.
customAncillary: While focusing on hull or armor, the Mercy's beams reduce the target's effective armor for damage reduction calculations by %s. Each additional multilance that hits simultaneously increases the penalty by %s.

name: Chalice Resonance Cage
tags: utility18, missile17, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_dealer, codex_unlockable
customPrimary: During the firing cycle, releases a constant stream of energy bolts at targets in range dealing %s points of %s damage on hit and %s points of %s damage, for %s additional DPS. When hitting hull or armor, convert any resisted EMP damage to %s damage.
customAncillary: Fires slow-moving energy mines that explode shortly after a target enters their proximity. Mines can't be disarmed by EMP emitters and are not distracted by flares.

name: Barb-class Drone Launcher
tags: utility9, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_dealer, codex_unlockable, no_standard_data
customPrimary: Launches a %s attack drone, adding it to the wing of any drones already launched by this ship. Drones will autonomously seek out and attack hostiles within approximately %s units.
customAncillary: See %s in the codex for drone statistics.

name: Barb-class Drone Replicator
tags: utility14, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_dealer, codex_unlockable, no_standard_data
customPrimary: Launches %s attack drones, adding them to the wing of any drones already launched by this ship. Drones will autonomously seek out and attack hostiles within approximately %s units.
customAncillary: See %s in the codex for drone statistics.

name: Nettle-class Drone Replicator
tags: utility18, sotf_dreaminggestalt, rare_bp, no_dealer, codex_unlockable, no_standard_data
customPrimary: Launches %s assault drones, adding them to the wing of any drones already launched by this ship. Drones will autonomously seek out and attack hostiles within approximately %s units.
customAncillary: See %s in the codex for drone statistics.

name: Hexdagger EML
customPrimary: Automatically fires while fully phased if there are hostiles in range.

name: Balefire EML
customPrimary: Can't be manually fired. If on autofire, automatically fires a burst when using the ship's system.

name: Discharge
customPrimary: Fires an EMP arc at the nearest target close to the weapon's current facing. The arc always hits.

name: Devastator Cannon
customPrimary:
Each shell has a fuse set to explode at a random distance, resulting in a barrage that's increasingly more deadly at closer ranges.

Will target missiles if no other targets are in range.
